items.text: full on middle, and Tamim has to take a big stride forward to defend
items.postText: MahneelMusa: "This ground will be Mahmudullah's home ground in the upcoming CPL for St. Kitts. "
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Bishoo returns. Four more overs for him.
items.text: length ball on off, and spinning away. Tapped to the off side
full on off, and pushed down the ground to mid on
full on leg, and he turns this off his pads to short fine leg. Can't steal the single though
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and Tamim rocks back to bring out the punch. Intercepted by Bishoo though
items.postText: KhalidRobin: "You put your best player with great reflex and instinct in slip position. Gayle as slip fielder? Questionable! "
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: half-tracker on middle once more. Flicked away to square leg off the back foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fuller on middle, but Tamim rocks back to clip it off his pads to deep square leg
stays low! Full outside off, but spinning further away, and Tamim misses the late cut
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up outside leg stump, and Tamim goes for the whip off his toes. He misses, and the keeper takes the bails off in a flash. Is he stumped?! His back foot was in the air, but he got it down before the bails came off. Just a wide then
full on off, and pushed with the angled bat to the fielder at deep point. A couple for Tamim

items.preText: Ahnaf: "Wish Mosaddek was promoted to either #4 or #5. One of our only players for the future and needs to be groomed properly before the WC. "
items.text: full on middle, and it's the one that goes straight through! Defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he plays a deft late cut straight to Lewis at short third man
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off, and driven along the ground to the sweeper fielder on the extra-cover region
smartly played! Overpitched on middle, and Mahmudullah opens his bat's face and plays a paddle sweep past the keeper's right. Goes to the drinks break with a boundary
items.postText:
Shashank: "Someone show KhalidRobin Gayle's catch in the GLT20 Canada Final. One of the best slip catches I have ever seen!"

saad asif: "Gayle's in the slip because of his Hand Eye Coordination"

items.preText: Amila: "@MahneelMusa; Do you really think BD can't find replacements for them (Players with Batting/Bowling Average in 30-40)? Only the hard deal will be replacement for Shakib (the all-rounder). By the way, it took nearly 10 years for them to get here. Younger crop would do the same with time."
items.text: tossed up on off, and he flicks it away to midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and worked away to square leg for a quick single

items.preText: umpire Wilson talks to Tamim for running down the pitch
items.text: length ball, and he nudges it off his hips behind square on the leg side
full on leg stump, and that's been clipped off his toes to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
goes past the outside edge! Length ball outside off, and spinning away. Into Hope's gloves
items.postText: yeo: "Want to see Sabbir out of the team as soon as possible. They obviously want him because he has a reputation of being a hard-hitter but he has never scored an international century, playing as a batsman, and last scored a 50 who knows when. String of off-pitch issues as well. Has to be the only player in the world to be able to play for the national team after being banned from all domestic games. Let's try and ground youngsters like Mossadek, Nazmul Hossain, Afif Hossain by batting them higher."

items.text: length ball on middle, and defended away to point
good length outside off, and he punches this straight back to Nurse off the back foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off, and that's been driven to the fielder at wide long on. Tamim on 91 now
full on leg stump, and that's been swept fine. But a diving effort from short fine leg stops the ball
length ball outside off, and angling across the batsman. Plays the cut past the infield for one
full on middle, and Tamim defends with the angled bat. The ball dribbles away to the leg side for one
